titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from unrelated business taxable income amounts set aside by a volunteer fire department for the purchase of equipment for use by such department.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/28/1999--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from unrelated business taxable income those amounts set aside by a volunteer fire department for the purchase of equipment for its exclusive use.
